title: Mineral exploration
brief_description: Shows the modern prospecting team of geologist, geophysicist and geochemist searching for and investigating the extent of Australia’s mineral resources. Shows geophysicists searching for extension of tin and lead ore bodies at Zeehan, measuring the electrical potential of the earth at the surface; conducting a seismic survey, re-examining old mining fields, drilling, using a geiger counter for aerial photographs to prepare base maps etc.
